title: Rito pls keep black market items
body:
Puppeteer, pox and trickster are the best items ever. Please keep them in the game somehow...

Down voted without any feedback yet again, what a nice community!

replies.body: lol thats not happening and you know it. it'll be more items for rito to have to balance which im sure they wouldnt care for. at least none of the items are as impactful as runeglaive on ez or sated devourer in general

Oh please, copying the feeder, walking under tower, and ending up to be the fed tank who can practically ignore tower hits is better than a mejai. Pox Arcana opens up opportunities for supports to go non-bot by giving them an expensive method of finally to getting damage they need to fill in the role later game. They're very impactful and you should know it if you've played with them for enough time.

I wish theyd keep the items in too, they add a whole new dimension to some champions.

Shit I'd like the see the new ARAM map replace the old one too, but oh well. Enjoy em while theyre here I guess.
